section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-cf79e4a elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

img.title: Home – 2

div.style: z-index: 8; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 24px; line-height: 30px; font-weight: 500; color: #523baa; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Rubik;
div.center:
The Hoboken Dual Language Charter School is
committed to providing an exceptional public
education in Spanish and English to develop
engaged, well-rounded bilingual citizens with
a global and multicultural perspective, who take
personal responsibility for becoming positive
members of their communities.

div.style: z-index: 10; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 32px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Changa One;
z-index: 11; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 24px; line-height: 30px; font-weight: 500; color: #523baa; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Rubik;

img.div:
The Hoboken Dual Language Charter School is
committed to providing an exceptional public
education in Spanish and English to develop
engaged, well-rounded bilingual citizens with
a global and multicultural perspective, who take
personal responsibility for becoming positive
members of their communities.

img.title: Home – 2

div.style: z-index: 9; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 24px; line-height: 30px; font-weight: 500; color: #6d1830; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Rubik;
div.center:
HoLa's core values describe who we are as
a school community and reflect our
commitment to diversity, equity, and
inclusivity, regardless or race, ethnicity,
religion, gender identity, physical or
mental ability, sexual orientation,
or socioeconomic status.

div.style: z-index: 10; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 22px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 500; color: #000000; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:rubik;

img.div:
HoLa's core values describe who we are as
a school community and reflect our
commitment to diversity, equity, and
inclusivity, regardless or race, ethnicity,
religion, gender identity, physical or
mental ability, sexual orientation,
or socioeconomic status.

div.style: z-index: 8; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 24px; line-height: 30px; font-weight: 500; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Rubik;
div.center:
Designated as a Model Dual Language Program
by the New Jersey Department of Education,
HoLa is proud to serve as a resource to other
language programs across the state, and beyond.
